titleStmt.title: CUA ICOR Donald J. Lehnus Collection MS 10

msIdentifier.idno: CUA ICOR Donald J. Lehnus Collection MS 10

msContents.summary: F-168v: Psalter, Dawit, ዳዊት፡. The midpoint () is marked with an ornate cross in the right margin. The spiritual meaning of the Hebrew Letters is given with the two letter system, e.g., ጋሜል ዳሌጥ ብሂል ጋዳ ስብሐት ለከ ተስባሕከ በዘወሀብከ ሕገከ, "Gimel Dalet means an offering of praise (gada) to you; you are glorified by the Law you have given". Psalm 151 is the short version with a few words added by a later hand. The fourth biblical canticle calls Hana a prophetess. Song of Songs is the common version. Front inside cover has a round mirror niche. F. i r: scrawls in an untrained hand. Ff. i v- iii v and 169r: Gǝ‘ǝz grammar, Säwasǝw, ሰዋስወ፡ ግእዝ፡. and 169v: Excerpt from Angels Praise Her, written in a later hand. Priases of Mary begins on Monday and culminates on Sunday.
